ei)s me

oi( d' i(ppei=s pote\ me\n a)pouragou=si toi=s au(tw=n e(/kastoi me/resi, pote\ de\ para\ ta\ u(pozu/gia pla/gioi paraporeu/ontai, sune/xontes tau=ta kai\ th\n a)sfa/leian tou/tois paraskeua/zontes.

 e)n braxei= xro/nw| kai\ mia=| kinh/sei to\ me

div2.head: VII. Rei Publicae Romanae cum Aliis Collatio

div3.p: sxedo\n dh\ pa/ntes oi( suggrafei=s peri\ tou/twn h(mi=n tw=n politeuma/twn paradedw/kasi th\n e)p' a)reth=| fh/mhn, peri/ te tou= *lakedaimoni/wn kai\ *krhtw=n kai\ *mantine/wn, e)/ti de\ *karxhdoni/wn: e)/nioi de\ kai\ peri\ th=s *)aqhnai/wn kai\ *qhbai/wn politei/as pepoi/hntai mnh/mhn.

e)gw\ de\ tau/tas me\n e)w=, th\n ga\r *)aqhnai/wn kai\ *qhbai/wn ou) pa/nu ti pollou= prosdei=sqai pe/peismai lo/gou dia\ to\ mh/te ta\s au)ch/seis e)sxhke/nai kata\ lo/gon mh/te ta\s a)kma\s e)pimo/nous, mh/te ta\s metabola\s e)nhllaxe/nai metri/ws,
a)ll' w(/sper e)k prospai/ou tino\s tu/xhs su\n kairw=| la/myantas, to\ dh\ lego/menon, e)/ti dokou=ntas a)kmh\n kai\ me/llontas eu)tuxei=n, th=s e)nanti/as pei=ran ei)lhfe/nai metabolh=s.

*qhbai=oi me
 ga th=| *lakedaimoni/wn a)gnoi/a| kai\ tw=| tw=n summa/xwn pro\s au)tou\s mi/sei sunepiqe/menoi, dia\ th
 e(no\s a)ndro\s a)reth
 h)\ kai\ deute/rou, tw=n ta\ proeirhme/na sunido/ntwn, periepoih/santo para\ toi=s *(/ellhsi th
 e)p' a)reth=| fh/mhn.
o(/ti ga\r ou)x h( th=s politei/as su/stasis ai)ti/a to/t' e)ge/neto *qhbai/ois tw=n eu)tuxhma/twn, a)ll' h( tw=n proestw/twn a)ndrw=n a)reth/, para\ po/das h( tu/xh tou=to pa=sin e)poi/hse dh=lon:
kai\ ga\r sunhuch/qh kai\ sunh/kmase kai\ sugkatelu/qh ta\ *qhbai/wn e)/rga tw=| t' *)epaminw/ndou kai\ tw=| *pelopi/dou bi/w| profanw=s.
e)c w(=n ou) th\n politei/an ai)ti/an, a)lla\ tou\s a)/ndras h(ghte/on th=s to/te
genome/nhs peri\ th\n *qhbai/wn po/lin e)pifanei/as. to\ de\ paraplh/sion kai\ peri\ th=s *)aqhnai/wn politei/as dialhpte/on.
kai\ ga\r au(/th pleona/kis me\n i)/sws, e)kfane/stata de\ th=| *qemistokle/ous a)reth=| sunanqh/sasa taxe/ws th=s e)nanti/as metabolh=s e)/labe pei=ran dia\ th\n a)nwmali/an th=s fu/sews.
a)ei\ ga/r pote to\n tw=n *)aqhnai/wn dh=mon paraplh/sion ei)=nai sumbai/nei toi=s a)despo/tois ska/fesi.

kai\ ga\r e)p' e)kei/nwn, o(/tan me\n h)\ dia\ pelagw=n fo/bon h)\ dia\ peri/stasin xeimw=nos o(rmh\ parasth=| toi=s e)piba/tais sumfronei=n kai\ prose/xein to\n nou=n tw=| kubernh/th|, gi/netai to\ de/on e)c au)tw=n diafero/ntws:
o(/tan de\ qarrh/santes a)/rcwntai katafronei=n tw=n proestw/twn kai\ stasia/zein pro\s a)llh/lous dia\ to\ mhke/ti dokei=n pa=si tau)ta/,

to/te dh\ tw=n me
 e)/ti plei=n proairoume/nwn, tw=n de\ katepeigo/ntwn o(rmi/zein to
 kubernh/thn, kai\ tw=n me
 e)kseio/ntwn tou\s ka/lous, tw=n d' e)pilambanome/nwn kai\ ste/llesqai parakeleuome/nwn, ai)sxra\ me
 pro/soyis gi/netai toi=s e)/cwqen qewme/nois dia\ th
 e)n a)llh/lois diafora
 kai\ sta/sin, e)pisfalh\s d' h( dia/qesis toi=s metasxou=si kai\ koinwnh/sasi tou= plou=:
dio\ kai\ polla/kis diafugo/ntes ta\ me/gista pela/gh kai\ tou\s e)pifanesta/tous xeimw=nas e)n toi=s lime/si kai\ pro\s th=| gh=| nauagou=sin.

o(\ dh\ kai\ th=| tw=n *)aqhnai/wn politei/a| pleona/kis h)/dh sumbe/bhke: diwsame/nh ga e)ni/ote ta\s megi/stas kai\ deinota/tas perista/seis dia/ te th
 tou= dh/mou kai\ th
 tw=n proestw/twn a)reth
 e)n tai=s a)perista/tois r(a|stw/nais ei)kh=| pws kai\ a)lo/gws e)ni/ote sfa/lletai.

dio\ kai\ peri\ me
 tau/ths te kai\ th=s tw=n *qhbai/wn ou)de
 dei= plei/w le/gein, e)n ai(=s o)/xlos xeiri/zei ta\ o(/la kata\ th
 i)di/an o(rmh/n, o( me
 o)cu/thti kai\ pikri/a| diafe/rwn, o( de\ bi/a| kai\ qumw=| sumpepaideume/nos.

e)pi\ de\ th
 *krhtaiw=n metaba/ntas a)/cion e)pisth=sai kata\ du/o tro/pous pw=s oi( logiw/tatoi tw=n a)rxai/wn suggrafe/wn, *)/eforos, *cenofw=n, *kallisqe/nhs, *pla/twn, prw=ton me
 o(moi/an ei)=nai/ fasi kai\ th
 au)th
 th=| *lakedaimoni/wn, deu/teron d' e)paineth
 u(pa/rxousan a)pofai/nousin:

p.foreign: Ingens numerus erat bello Punico captorum, quos Hannibal, cum ab suis non redimerentur, venum dederat. multitudinis eorum argumentum est, quod Polybius scribit centum talentis eam rem Achaeis stetisse, cum quingenos denarios pretium in capita, quod redderetur dominis, statuissent.

div3.p: o(/ti fhsi\n o( *polu/bios e)n tw=| ei)kostw=| deute/rw|: peri\ de\ th\n tw=n e)n *makedoni/a| basile/wn oi)ki/an h)/dh tis a)po\ tou/twn tw=n kairw=n e)fu/eto kakw=n a)nhke/stwn a)rxh/.

kai/toi g' ou)k a)gnow= dio/ti tine\s tw=n suggrafo/ntwn peri\ tou= &open;susta/ntos&close; *(rwmai/ois pole/mou pro\s *perse/a, boulo/menoi ta\s ai)ti/as h(mi=n e)pideiknu/nai th=s diafora=s, prw=ton me
 a)pofai/nousi th
 *)abroupo/lios e)/kptwsin e)k th=s i)di/as dunastei/as, w(s katadramo/ntos au)tou= ta\ peri\ to\ *pa/ggaion me/talla meta\ to
 tou= *fili/ppou qa/naton:
*perseu\s de\ parabohqh/sas kai\ treya/menos o(losxerw=s e)ce/bale to\n proeirhme/non e)k th=s i)di/as a)rxh=s:

e(ch=s de\ tau/th| th
 ei)s *dolopi/an ei)sbolh
 kai\ th

e)/ti de\ th
 kat' *eu)me/nous tou= basile/ws e)piboulh

e)gw\ de/ fhmi kuriw/taton me\n ei)=nai kai\ toi=s suggra/fousi kai\ toi=s filomaqou=si to\ ginw/skein ta\s ai)ti/as, e)c w(=n e(/kasta genna=tai kai\ fu/etai tw=n pragma/twn: sugke/xutai de\ tau=ta para\ toi=s plei/stois tw=n suggrafe/wn dia\ to\ mh\ kratei=sqai ti/ni diafe/rei pro/fasis ai)ti/as kai\ pa/lin profa/sews a)rxh\ pole/mou.
kai\ nu=n de\ tw=n pragma/twn au)tw=n prosupomimnhsko/ntwn h)na/gkasmai pa/lin a)nanew/sasqai to\n au)to\n lo/gon.

tw=n ga a)/rti r(hqe/ntwn pragma/twn ta\ me

&close; tw=n presbeutw=n a)nai/resin kai\ tou/tois e(/tera paraplh/sia tw=n kata\ tou\s au)tou\s kairou\s gegono/twn a)rxai\ pro/dhloi tou= susta/ntos *(rwmai/ois kai\ *persei= pole/mou kai\ tou= kataluqh=nai th

ai)ti/a de\ tou/twn a(plw=s e)stin ou)demi/a. dh=lon de\ tou=t' e)/stai dia\ tw=n e(ch=s r(hqhsome/nwn.

 pro\s tou\s *pe/rsas po/lemon, *)ale/candron de\ toi=s u(p' e)kei/nou kekrime/nois &open;e)pigene/sqai&close; xeiristh

ei) de\ tou=t' a)lhqe/s, ka)kei=no safe/s: ou) ga\r oi(=o/n te ta\s ai)ti/as u(/steron gene/sqai th=s teleuth=s tou= kri/nantos kai\ proqeme/nou polemei=n: o(\ sumbai/nei toi=s u(po\ tw=n a)/llwn suggrafe/wn ei)rhme/nois: pa/nta ga/r e)sti ta\ lego/mena par' au)toi=s u(/stera th=s *fili/ppou teleuth=s. —

a)lla\ dia\ th\n nu=n e)pipola/zousan a)krisi/an braxei/as e)/xonta koino/thtas ta\ proeirhme/na th=s au)th=s e)pishmasi/as kai\ zh/lou tugxa/nei para\ toi=s a)nqrw/pois.
